episodes.title: Escape: My Life Long War Against Cults with Author and Attorney Paul Morantz (August 16, 1945 – October 23, 2022). (2020)
episodes.description: Escape: My Life Long War Against Cults with Author and Attorney Paul Morantz (August 16, 1945 – October 23, 2022). (2020) Paul Morantz was one of my first interviews. After I reached out to him, he invited me to his place in Los Angeles to both meet and so I could pick up a signed copy of his book Escape, discussed herein. He invited me into his home to get his book and sign it. I remember him as an easygoing, gracious person. He walked me out to his driveway and as I turned to leave, I instinctively reached out to shake his hand. Morantz responded and placed his snake-bitten, damaged right hand into mine. Surprised, I tried to keep a straight face as I walked to my car. Driving off, I upbraided myself for extending my right hand to him with out thinking; however, meeting Paul Morantz remains a memorable event. Rest in peace. William Ramsey Paul Morantz dies; L.A. attorney nearly killed when cult planted rattlesnake in his mailbox https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2022-10-28/paul-morantz-dies-l-a-attorney-nearly-killed-when-cult-planted-rattlesnake-in-mailbox https://www.amazon.com/Escape-Life-Long-Against-Cults/dp/0615848699/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=paul+morantz&qid=1607185288&sr=8-2 Author website: http://www.paulmorantz.com/ Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/william-ramsey-investigates--1898073/support .
